Methods in org.whispercomm.c2dm4j.async with parameters of type AuthTokenProvider
static AsyncC2dmManager AsyncC2dmManagerFactory.create(HttpClient client, AuthTokenProvider provider, AsyncHandlers handlers, ScheduledExecutorService executor)
          Creates an AsyncC2dmManager instance that uses a ScheduledExecutorService to deliver messages via an C2dmManager instance constructed from the given HttpClient and AuthTokenProvider.

Uses of AuthTokenProvider in org.whispercomm.c2dm4j.impl
 

Constructors in org.whispercomm.c2dm4j.impl with parameters of type AuthTokenProvider
DefaultC2dmManager(HttpClient httpClient, AuthTokenProvider tokenProvider)
          Constructs a new DefaultC2dmManager using the specified HttpClient to send HTTP requests and AuthTokenProvider to retrieve and persist the authentication token.
